name: Notion Subtasks Template
description: Subtasks,Sub(sub)tasks,Sub(sub)²tasks.When you work on complex projects, some tasks often require subtasks. And some of these subtasks sometimes need (sub)subtasks. And occasionally, these (sub)subtasks also need (sub)²subtasks.This template allows you to create 3-levels subtasks while maintaining access to the project that each task belongs to.Features Project Tasks Level 1 Subtasks Level 2 Subtasks Level 3 Subtasks For more details & instructions, please visit my article on the subject.FAQ
features: Level 1 Subtasks; Level 2 Subtasks; Level 3 Subtasks
